scripts.install-all: concurrently "npm install --prefix common-components" "npm install --prefix mfe-service-a" "npm install --prefix shell" "npm install --prefix shared-uitoolkit"
scripts.start-all-apps: npm run build-shell && concurrently "npm start --prefix shell" "npm start --prefix common-components" "npm start --prefix shared-uitoolkit"
scripts.start-shell: npm run build-shell && concurrently "npm start --prefix shell"
scripts.start-all: concurrently "npm run services" "npm run start-all-apps" "npm run start-shell"
